GSD.description:
ALSA: jack: Access input_dev under mutex

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 9e6a73b0c0f2014eb89249fb1640c5a3d58221c4. For more details please see the references link.
